body:
🌻melted ice cream🌻

my summer is almost over ))“: so here you go, pure fluff,,,, also cause i haven’t been writing as much as i should be,,

🌿peter dusted off his black overalls (which was a bad choice, the sun was relentless today and he swore he was trapped in a fiery death machine), swinging his feel patiently. he managed to stop the ice cream truck for about fifteen minutes while he waited for tony to make it to the park bench but his stalling eventually became pointless babbling.

🌿so instead of eating his ice cream with tony he had to hurry and eat his own vanilla and chocolate swirl without the company of his boyfriend before it melted. his big brown eyes focused on the road, tony’s melted ice cream that just started to spill over and get his poor hands sticky stayed in his peripheral vision.

🌿"hey, kid!” tony’s velvety voice met peter’s ears, his head snapping over to tony’s direction. peter fixed the falling strap back over his shoulder before shyly waving. tony walked over, his hands stuffed into his pockets. the suited man sat beside the smaller boy with a raised eyebrow, as if expecting something.

🌿"hey,“ peter smiled warmly, his right hand that held onto the ice cream twitched, apprehensive. "i, uh,” he cleared his throat. “got you this.. not that it’s any good, anymore..” he watched guilt flicker in tony’s dark eyes. “but that’s alright! i wasn’t- wasn’t waiting for that long.” he added.

🌿"im sorry, pete. next time you come to me, we can have all the ice cream you want.“ tony’s hand ghosted over peter’s hesitantly. he nibbled his bottom lip as if he were asking for permission.

🌿"yeah, yeah!” peter laughed, then quickly became visibly smaller. “i mean, uh, if you want.” he glanced at their hands, his pinky growing a mind of its own only to lock itself with tony’s. tony’s hand was rough but still gentle and well moisturized, he took care of himself even though he worked harder than most. the melted ice cream sat beside peter, long forgotten.

🌿the corners of tony’s pink lips twitched into a slight smile. then, as if things couldn’t get better, tony fully laced his fingers with peter’s and placed his other warm hand over the two “oh, kid. you reminded me,” peter’s eyes widened curiously when tony pulled a daisy out of his pocket. the flower was hidden behind his handkerchief.

🌿"i saw it while i was walking here,“ he shrugged. "reminded me of you, ‘cause for some odd reason you always smell like flowers and daisies.” he laughed gingerly, his nimble fingers tucking the flower behind peter’s flushed ear.

blog.description: I am a human person with thoughts and feelings Feminist | she/her | anxiety disorder | emotional about lady superheroes.

summary: Can someone explain this to me?
body:
Can someone explain this to me?

I am not reading “Hunt for Wolverine” can anyone explain the “revelation” about Sarah Kinney’s DNA being present in X-23 as well? Because…

Like the panel I saw said she is “not just a clone of Wolverine” or whatever. And implied she was Sarah’s clone to… which isn’t how genetics works.

If she has Wolverine and Sarah’s DNA both then she is their child, full stop genetically speaking. She is no longer a “clone” at all?

This isn’t how words work.

summary: from this day forward, i dont give a shit. antis? interacting with my posts? be my guest, ill block yall without a sliver of a...
body: from this day forward, i dont give a shit. antis? interacting with my posts? be my guest, ill block yall without a sliver of a delay. antis, in my inbox, as per usual? knock yourselves out cause i aint gonna reply. talk shit about me based on the fact i love tony? eat shit, for all i care. this is a Love & Respect Avengers Only blog from now on and the rest of yall are welcome to stay for the fucking Ride

title: Humiliation
body:
Masterlist

Requested by @taylorsreputationn :  if you’re taking requests, i LOVE your tony stark x reader fluff fics! please!!!!

Pairing: Tony Stark x Reader

Words: 1365

Warnings: none, just fluff

A/N: I should be in bed now since I have to work tomorrow, but I couldn’t do that without finishing this first so there you go! I hope you like it!

(gif was found on giphy)

Y/N threw her head back while laughing as Sam made yet another joke about the barista that served him at Starbucks today. Her laughter ceased when she felt the back of her head tingle and an odd sensation ran down her spine.

She knew the feeling all too well and was pretty sure she knew who caused it as well.

Emptying her beer in one swig, she stood up from the couch and shook the bottle in her hands to signal Sam she needed another one to which he gave a curt nod, a small, knowing smirk appearing on his face.

Y/N let out a sigh and turned around, noticing that Tony stood by the kitchen isle with a glass of scotch in his hand. His other hand rested atop the counter while his eyes found hers causing the corner of his lips to quirk.

She narrowed her eyes at him as she started making her way towards the fridge. Tony had been acting strange towards as of late and she was yet to find out what the reason was.

He wasn’t acting strangely in a bad way – quite the contrary, actually. He seemed to sit closer to her during dinner or movie nights and he let his innocent touches linger longer than before, sometimes even rubbing his thumb over whatever body part he was touching.

Y/N didn’t mind the attention she got from the handsome billionaire in the slightest. She had always been fond of him and that a man like him would even bother with someone like her made her feel more confident than ever.

The only problem was that she gradually felt herself fall for him and the feeling was overwhelming, to say the least. She didn’t like to deal with anything that concerned her feelings or whatever else was going on in her heart.

To be honest, she was more of a brain person.

But then her brain also started telling her that she was falling for Tony, the thought playing in her head like a broken record. So, she did what she could do best; avoid the problem as much as possible and if said problem gets confrontational, just walk away.

In the past two weeks though, she started acting like a teenager with their first crush. She blushed any time he touched her and giggled in an annoying pitch when he made a comment that wasn’t even that funny.

She felt like she was losing control and didn’t like it one bit.

For some reason, she also felt like Tony knew something about her that he shouldn’t. The way one of his eyebrows rose in an anticipatory manner and how he licked his lips anytime he looked her way told her as much.

As she grabbed another beer from the fridge, she didn’t notice that Tony had turned around to face her while he watched her get lost in her thoughts. He crossed one arm and propped the other up, so his glass rested against his lips.

Y/N turned around, her eyes on the floor as she didn’t want to crumble beneath Tony’s intense gaze just yet. She knew that as soon as she looked up and met his striking dark eyes, she would start acting like that version of herself she didn’t like.

But while she took the tiniest sips from her beer, she felt his eyes burn a hole into her forehead. The silence between them was deafening and it caused her to shift from one foot to the other.

“Did it hurt?” Tony’s question caught her off-guard and a confused frown appeared on her face. Besides, the question was nothing but odd, why would she be hurt? The last mission she went on was a success and nobody received more than a few scratches.

She slowly let her eyes meet his, letting them trail over his body beforehand. She let herself admire the way his thighs looked in the form-fitting jeans and how the veins in his arms stood out.

She had to stop herself from drooling and when she finally looked at him, she put up her walls. Her back straightened as she tried to make herself appear more confident.

As part of her act, she rolled her eyes at him and crossed her arms over her chest as she answered, “Let me guess when I fell from heaven?”

“No,”

“What then?” Her eyebrows creased in confusion once more as she leaned in his direction a little.

In return, Tony only grinned while taking another sip of his Scotch, “Did it hurt when you fell for me?”

Y/N almost dropped her beer as a thousand different emotions ran through her veins, some almost making her heart stop beating while others almost caused it to drop into her pants.

Her eyes were wide like saucers as they darted from Tony’s face to the rest of his body and behind him. She didn’t know what to do with herself or what to say so she opted for opening and closing her mouth like a fish on land.

Tony, on the other hand, wasn’t bothered by anything in the slightest at the moment. He was just glad Y/N reacted the way she did. Otherwise, this would’ve been the most humiliating thing he went through in the time he lived on this earth – and that was a lot coming from Tony Stark himself.

“How did you- Who- What?” Y/N managed to stutter out causing Tony to chuckle and move away from the kitchen isle he was leaning against. He took a few steps towards her, keeping a close eye on her body language.

“I didn’t,” he answered, shrugging his shoulders, “you just told me yourself,” A smirk played on his lips as he watched her jaw hit the floor. But it disappeared as soon as he took notice of the glint in her eyes.

Anger, frustration and hurt – those were the emotions Tony saw flash behind her beautiful eyes.

He immediately felt regret run through his head, almost dizzying him in the process. He didn’t intend to humiliate her the way he probably did just now, he was never good at letting people know about his emotions and now she would turn her back on him.

“I hope you got the entertainment you were looking from this,” she mumbled in a frighteningly calm tone making Tony hit himself in his head.

“No, I didn’t do this to entertain myself,” he sighed, setting his glass down on the kitchen isle behind him. He took a deep breath through his nose while his blood started to pulse faster through his veins.

“Then why?” She whispered, her arms crossing tighter over her chest making her body take on a defensive stance.

Tony reached out his hand, touching her cheek and breathing a sigh of relief when she didn’t slap it away or flinch. His other lifted slowly until he was cupping her face, her skin soft against his calloused hands while he rubbed his thumb over the apples of her cheeks.

Tony brought his own face closer to hers, their noses bumping together and closed his eyes for a second. He breathed in her scent and revelled in the warmth radiating off of her.

When he opened his eyes again, she was already looking at him with an expecting expression on her face.

“I love you,” he mumbled.

His shoulders tensed when he heard a small gasp leave her mouth. But it wasn’t a bad one, her face displayed nothing but joy and love for the man standing in front of her.

In the heat of the moment, Y/N decided to throw her arms around his neck and close the gap between their mouths. Tony’s breath stilled for a second but it almost went unnoticed by her as a second later he started kissing her back with the equal amount of passion.

She smiled against his lips, the part of herself she didn’t like melting away with the heat the kiss possessed.

—

Feel free to leave a message or ask if you wanna be added to my taglist!

Taglist: @thatsunacceptable - @jitterbuck - @kuro-no-kenshi

In the heat of the moment, Y/N decided to throw her arms around his neck and close the gap between their mouths. Tony’s breath stilled for a second but it almost went unnoticed by her as a second later he started kissing her back with the equal amount of passion.

She smiled against his lips, the part of herself she didn’t like melting away with the heat the kiss possessed.

—

Feel free to leave a message or ask if you wanna be added to my taglist!

Taglist: @thatsunacceptable - @jitterbuck - @kuro-no-kenshi

trail.content_raw:
Masterlist

Requested by @taylorsreputationn :  if you’re taking requests, i LOVE your tony stark x reader fluff fics! please!!!!

Pairing: Tony Stark x Reader

Words: 1365

Warnings: none, just fluff

A/N: I should be in bed now since I have to work tomorrow, but I couldn’t do that without finishing this first so there you go! I hope you like it!

(gif was found on giphy)

[[MORE]]

Y/N threw her head back while laughing as Sam made yet another joke about the barista that served him at Starbucks today. Her laughter ceased when she felt the back of her head tingle and an odd sensation ran down her spine.

She knew the feeling all too well and was pretty sure she knew who caused it as well.

Emptying her beer in one swig, she stood up from the couch and shook the bottle in her hands to signal Sam she needed another one to which he gave a curt nod, a small, knowing smirk appearing on his face.

Y/N let out a sigh and turned around, noticing that Tony stood by the kitchen isle with a glass of scotch in his hand. His other hand rested atop the counter while his eyes found hers causing the corner of his lips to quirk.

She narrowed her eyes at him as she started making her way towards the fridge. Tony had been acting strange towards as of late and she was yet to find out what the reason was.

He wasn’t acting strangely in a bad way – quite the contrary, actually. He seemed to sit closer to her during dinner or movie nights and he let his innocent touches linger longer than before, sometimes even rubbing his thumb over whatever body part he was touching.

Y/N didn’t mind the attention she got from the handsome billionaire in the slightest. She had always been fond of him and that a man like him would even bother with someone like her made her feel more confident than ever.

The only problem was that she gradually felt herself fall for him and the feeling was overwhelming, to say the least. She didn’t like to deal with anything that concerned her feelings or whatever else was going on in her heart.

To be honest, she was more of a brain person.

But then her brain also started telling her that she was falling for Tony, the thought playing in her head like a broken record. So, she did what she could do best; avoid the problem as much as possible and if said problem gets confrontational, just walk away.

In the past two weeks though, she started acting like a teenager with their first crush. She blushed any time he touched her and giggled in an annoying pitch when he made a comment that wasn’t even that funny.

She felt like she was losing control and didn’t like it one bit.

For some reason, she also felt like Tony knew something about her that he shouldn’t. The way one of his eyebrows rose in an anticipatory manner and how he licked his lips anytime he looked her way told her as much.

As she grabbed another beer from the fridge, she didn’t notice that Tony had turned around to face her while he watched her get lost in her thoughts. He crossed one arm and propped the other up, so his glass rested against his lips.

Y/N turned around, her eyes on the floor as she didn’t want to crumble beneath Tony’s intense gaze just yet. She knew that as soon as she looked up and met his striking dark eyes, she would start acting like that version of herself she didn’t like.

But while she took the tiniest sips from her beer, she felt his eyes burn a hole into her forehead. The silence between them was deafening and it caused her to shift from one foot to the other.

“Did it hurt?” Tony’s question caught her off-guard and a confused frown appeared on her face. Besides, the question was nothing but odd, why would she be hurt? The last mission she went on was a success and nobody received more than a few scratches.

She slowly let her eyes meet his, letting them trail over his body beforehand. She let herself admire the way his thighs looked in the form-fitting jeans and how the veins in his arms stood out.

She had to stop herself from drooling and when she finally looked at him, she put up her walls. Her back straightened as she tried to make herself appear more confident.

As part of her act, she rolled her eyes at him and crossed her arms over her chest as she answered, “Let me guess when I fell from heaven?”

“No,”

“What then?” Her eyebrows creased in confusion once more as she leaned in his direction a little.

In return, Tony only grinned while taking another sip of his Scotch, “Did it hurt when you fell for me?”

Y/N almost dropped her beer as a thousand different emotions ran through her veins, some almost making her heart stop beating while others almost caused it to drop into her pants.

Her eyes were wide like saucers as they darted from Tony’s face to the rest of his body and behind him. She didn’t know what to do with herself or what to say so she opted for opening and closing her mouth like a fish on land.

Tony, on the other hand, wasn’t bothered by anything in the slightest at the moment. He was just glad Y/N reacted the way she did. Otherwise, this would’ve been the most humiliating thing he went through in the time he lived on this earth – and that was a lot coming from Tony Stark himself.

“How did you- Who- What?” Y/N managed to stutter out causing Tony to chuckle and move away from the kitchen isle he was leaning against. He took a few steps towards her, keeping a close eye on her body language.

“I didn’t,” he answered, shrugging his shoulders, “you just told me yourself,” A smirk played on his lips as he watched her jaw hit the floor. But it disappeared as soon as he took notice of the glint in her eyes.

Anger, frustration and hurt – those were the emotions Tony saw flash behind her beautiful eyes.

He immediately felt regret run through his head, almost dizzying him in the process. He didn’t intend to humiliate her the way he probably did just now, he was never good at letting people know about his emotions and now she would turn her back on him.

“I hope you got the entertainment you were looking from this,” she mumbled in a frighteningly calm tone making Tony hit himself in his head.

“No, I didn’t do this to entertain myself,” he sighed, setting his glass down on the kitchen isle behind him. He took a deep breath through his nose while his blood started to pulse faster through his veins.

“Then why?” She whispered, her arms crossing tighter over her chest making her body take on a defensive stance.

Tony reached out his hand, touching her cheek and breathing a sigh of relief when she didn’t slap it away or flinch. His other lifted slowly until he was cupping her face, her skin soft against his calloused hands while he rubbed his thumb over the apples of her cheeks.

Tony brought his own face closer to hers, their noses bumping together and closed his eyes for a second. He breathed in her scent and revelled in the warmth radiating off of her.

When he opened his eyes again, she was already looking at him with an expecting expression on her face.

“I love you,” he mumbled.

His shoulders tensed when he heard a small gasp leave her mouth. But it wasn’t a bad one, her face displayed nothing but joy and love for the man standing in front of her.

In the heat of the moment, Y/N decided to throw her arms around his neck and close the gap between their mouths. Tony’s breath stilled for a second but it almost went unnoticed by her as a second later he started kissing her back with the equal amount of passion.

She smiled against his lips, the part of herself she didn’t like melting away with the heat the kiss possessed.

—

Feel free to leave a message or ask if you wanna be added to my taglist!

Taglist: @thatsunacceptable - @jitterbuck - @kuro-no-kenshi

title: First impressions
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OjzC1I

by That__1nerd

Tony carefully cradled the back of his sons head as he held him for the first time.
“Mr.Stark,” the doctor asked the billionaire.
“What are you going to name him?”
Tony thought for a moment and looked at his baby’s little doe eyes.

“Peter. His name is Peter.”

Words: 397, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 12 of Tony is an amazing dad

title: Bloodreina - The New Avenger (Marvel/The 100)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KD5nAs

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Shifter Shifter
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MvkgGV

by FoxyPoxy

Tony and the new Avengers likes to play pranks on each other all the time. Often times it has to do with inside jokes that only they know about. They had that easy chemistry that could go for days. Tony didn’t like to shift in front of people. After having to spend a month in shift form around the New Avengers he learns that they are like Rhodey and wont make fun of him or hurt him. After the return of the Rogues things got harder for them.

Words: 608, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel, Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Other
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), T'Challa (Marvel), Laura Barton, Lila Barton, Cooper Barton, Nathaniel Pietro Barton, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, James “Bucky” Barnes, Vision
  • Relationships: Laura Barton & Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker/Wade Wilson, James “Rhodey” Rhodes/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Not Wanda Friendly, Not Team Cap, Pranks and Practical Jokes, Shifters, Silly, Cat Tony Stark, Tony Being Tony, dog Bucky
